FILE: cm211365v11.0.txtDYAD: BELGIUM - RUSSIA/USSRRIVALRY: RIV513DISPUTE(S): MID2612RIVALRY: RIV2001DISPUTE(S): MID4342 PS-NOTES:PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180212PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180212Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues VariablesMID2612 TERRMID: MID2612 3 -- not territory TERRMID-CER: MID2612 1 -- certain TERRMID-NOTES: MID2612 from Gibler (2018), this MID occurs shortly after Belgium relinquished its colonization of Congo. Russia threatened Belgium and warned them to remove the rest of their troops from the Congo. Coded not territory because Belgium no longer claimed the territory and the Russians had no claim, so no boundary was being disputed between dyad members.TERRLINK: MID2612 3 -- not third party link to territory TERRLINK-CER: MID2612 1 -- certain TERRLINK-NOTES: MARITMID: MID2612 3 -- not maritime MARITMID-CER: MID2612 1 -- certain MARITMID-NOTES: ISLMID: MID2612 3 -- not islands ISLMID-CER: MID2612 1 -- certain ISLMID-NOTES: CIVWARMID: MID2612 3 -- not civil war CIVWARMID-CER: MID2612 1 -- certain CIVWARMID-NOTES:CIVWARLINK: MID2612 3 -- not civil war link CIVWARLINK-CER: MID2612 1 -- certain CIVWARLINK-NOTES: COUPMID: MID2612 3 -- not coup COUPMID-CER: MID2612 1 -- certain COUPMID-NOTES: COUPLINK: MID2612 3 -- not coup linkCOUPLINK-CER: MID2612 1 -- certain COUPLINK-NOTES: MID4342 TERRMID: MID4342 3 -- not territory TERRMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain TERRMID-NOTES: TERRLINK: MID4342 1 -- third party link to territorial MIDTERRLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain TERRLINK-NOTES: MID4342 from Gibler (2018), Russian forces went on alert during a NATO bombing of Yugoslavia. Russia also warned NATO against broadening the war. Coded third party link to territorial MID because this was connected to the Yugoslav War, which was a territorial dispute. MARITMID: MID4342 3 -- not maritime MARITMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain MARITMID-NOTES: ISLMID: MID4342 3 -- not islands ISLMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain ISLMID-NOTES: CIVWARMID: MID4342 3 -- not civil war CIVWARMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain CIVWARMID-NOTES: CIVWARLINK: MID4342 1 -- civil war link CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain CIVWARLINK-NOTES: MID4342 the Yugoslav Wars involved armed militant groups, organized along ethnic lines. Coded third party link because there was extensive civil war activity in Yugoslavia, outside of this dyad. COUPMID: MID4342 3 -- not coup COUPMID-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain COUPMID-NOTES: COUPLINK: MID4342 3 -- not coup linkCOUPLINK-CER: MID4342 1 -- certain COUPLINK-NOTES: MID3 1993-2001:MID4342rivalry=211365 nationa=RUSSIA/USSR nationb=BELGIUM MID4342 19990408-19990419  revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE  revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION First day of dispute was on 4/8/1999 and last day of dispute was on 4/19/1999.NO DISPUTE NARRATIVE AVAILABLE FROM COWRIVNOTES: RIV512 deleted because MID258 does not appear in the COW dyadic 3.1 data or the Maoz 2.0 dyadic data. DATES (may not be accurate, see riv5.20all.cvs): 19390917 -19390929RIV2001: new rivalry because MID4342 was added by MID3.02NARRATIVE-CM:SOURCES-CM:NARRATIVE-CR:SOURCES-CR:SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield.
